titles: By the King where in a proclamation (lately by vs published) for considerations therein expressed, we prescribed a course whereby the complaints of our people might bee taken away ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
notes: Announcing surrender of the patent for tin.
"Giuen at our Mannour of Greenwich the 16. day of Iune, in the first yeere of our Reigne of England, France, and Ireland, And in the sixe and thirtieth of Scotland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Tin industry --  England --  Early works to 1800.
